name: cohost-api
description: An unofficial tRPC-based wrapper API for Cohost.org

scripts.docs: rimraf temp-docs && typedoc index.ts --commentStyle block --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --theme markdown --out temp-docs && concat-md --toc --decrease-title-levels --ignore README.md,modules.md --dir-name-as-title temp-docs > reference.md && rimraf temp-docs

author: Apex
